raw_mentions:
According to the present invention, those compounds having high binding to a particular NMDA subunit exhibit an IC50 of about 100 μM or less in an NMDA subunit binding assay.
Preferably, the compounds of the present invention exhibit a selective subunit IC50 of 10 μM or less.
More preferably, the compounds of the present invention exhibit a selective subunit IC50 of about 1.0 μM or less, more preferably about 0.1μM or less.
